title: What if French Montana and Cardi B Were Really Really Tall?
text: Kanye West might be pushing back the release of Jesus Is King, but at least someone is putting out bangers and asking the big questions. French Montana released the video for “Writing on the Wall” Thursday night, in which Montana, Post Malone, Cardi B, and Rvssian are all larger than life. Lana Del Rey’s video for “Doin’ Time” also featured an attack of the 50-foot popstar. Is this a trend? Social commentary? Cardi B uses a skyscraper as a giant mirror for her giant lingere-clad bod, surely that means something in the context of late capitalism and her role in Hustlers. Right?
description: French Montana, Cardi B, Post Malone, and Rvssian starred in Montana’s music video for “Writing on the Wall.” In the video, the popstars are giant and loom over New York, much like Lana Del Rey did for LA in her video for “Doin’ Time.”
